mapper.select: select * from users where user_account = #{userAccount} and user_pwd = #{userPwd}
select * from users u inner join roles r on r.role_id = u.role_id inner join sex s on s.sex_id = u.sex_id inner join dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id where u.user_status = 1

select * from(select a.*,rownum rn from( select * from users u inner join roles r on r.role_id = u.role_id inner join sex s on s.sex_id = u.sex_id inner join dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id ) a where rownum<=#{pageNo}*#{pageSize}) where rn>(#{pageNo}-1)*#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update users set user_status = 0 where user_id = #{userId}
